## Executive Producer

**The Real Deal**

The Real Deal is the world’s first impact investing TV show and 360-degree property on social entrepreneurship. It serves to find, feature and fund India’s best for-profit social entrepreneurs by bringing them face to face with impact investors who are looking to invest in the next big thing.

This high-stakes, entertaining show spans 10 episodes in a reality-game-show format, merging social change and entrepreneurship.

[The Real Deal](https://sites.ndtv.com/therealdeal/video-detail/whos-the-mystery-investor-at-ithe-real-deali-gala-413966/)

**Face of India (Social Media and TV Campaign)**

Face of India, in association with Getty Images, discovers India’s best emerging portrait photographers. This amateur & enthusiast photography award shines a spotlight on up-and-coming non-professional and student talent, exposing and celebrating the art of portraiture.

[Face of India (Social Media and TV Campaign)](https://www.ndtv.com/video/special/news/photography-competition-participate-now-387067)

**Freewheeling Mercedes 125 yrs.**

This half-hour documentary traces the successes, failures, and revival of Mercedes over the past 125 years. Sit back and enjoy the thrilling ride.

[Freewheeling Mercedes 125 yrs.](https://www.ndtv.com/video/shows/freewheeling-around-the-world/125-years-of-the-automobile-189511)

**Flashes in Time – Documentary on Photography**

At the Delhi Photo Festival, photographers worldwide celebrate the stills that defined moments. This documentary explores how photography conveys struggle through dynamic exhibitions and shared experiences.

[Flashes in Time – Documentary on Photography](https://www.ndtv.com/video/shows/ndtv-specials/flashes-in-time-a-documentary-on-photography-390777)

**The Making of Luxurious Residential Project in Worli, Omkar 1973**

Babulal Verma, MD of Omkar Realtors, discusses the vision and future plans behind Omkar 1973.

[The Making of Luxurious Residential Project in Worli, Omkar 1973](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uitjqDxp74s)

**The St. Regis Mumbai Preview by NDTV**

Go behind the scenes at Mumbai’s iconic St. Regis. Meet extraordinary guests, explore the art collections, and discover the service ethos of this world-class hotel.

[The St. Regis Mumbai Preview by NDTV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rK6fAg7aiAk&t=385s)
